title: `fu` for Fifth Place
goal: Complete the place tag system with `fu` for x5.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Four-place tagging review:

Tags so far: fa, fe, fi, fo

Translate with tags: mi vecnu la cukta do mu no → ?

(Answer: fa mi cu vecnu fe la cukta fi do fo mu no)

New Material (5-7 min)

The Fifth Place Tag: fu

fu la karce fa mi cu klama fe la .paris. — By car, I go to Paris.

fu marks the fifth place — completing the tag system.

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
nitcu x1 needs x2 for purpose x3 need
kakne x1 is able to do x2 under conditions x3 able/can

fu with klama

klama: x1 goes to x2 from x3 via x4 using x5 (vehicle)

Normal With Tags
mi klama la .paris. la .london. la dargu la karce fa mi cu klama fe la .paris. fi la .london. fo la dargu fu la karce

Vehicle first: fu la karce fa mi cu klama fe la .paris. — By car, I go to Paris.

The Complete Tag System

Tag Marks Example meaning for klama
fa x1 goer
fe x2 destination
fi x3 origin
fo x4 route
fu x5 vehicle

When to Use fu

fu is rare because few gismu have meaningful fifth places. Use it when:

  1. Emphasizing the vehicle/method
  2. Answering "how did you get there?"

Full klama with Tags

fu la karce fo la dargu fi la .london. fe la .paris. fa mi cu klama

Completely scrambled order — but the tags make it clear:

  • fu (x5) = la karce (by car)
  • fo (x4) = la dargu (via road)
  • fi (x3) = la .london. (from London)
  • fe (x2) = la .paris. (to Paris)
  • fa (x1) = mi (I go)

Key Point

fu marks x5, completing the five-tag system. With all five tags, you can express any gismu's places in any order.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)
sections.keyPoint: `fu` marks x5, completing the five-tag system. With all five tags, you can express any gismu's places in any order.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Add Full Tags

Rewrite with all necessary tags:

  1. mi klama la zarci la zdani zo'e la karce → ?
  2. do klama la .paris. la .london. la dargu la .treni. → ?
Answers
  1. fa mi cu klama fe la zarci fi la zdani fu la karce
  2. fa do cu klama fe la .paris. fi la .london. fo la dargu fu la .treni.

Exercise 2: Vehicle First

Put the vehicle first using fu:

  1. mi klama la zdani zo'e zo'e la karce → ?
  2. la .bob. cu klama la .paris. zo'e zo'e la .treni. → ?
Answers
  1. fu la karce fa mi cu klama fe la zdani
  2. fu la .treni. fa la .bob. cu klama fe la .paris.

Exercise 3: Interpret

Translate to English:

  1. fu la karce fa do cu klama fe la zarci
  2. fa mi cu nitcu fe la skami
  3. fa la .alis. cu kakne fe ti
Answers
  1. By car, you go to the market.
  2. I need a computer.
  3. Alice is able to do this. / Alice can do this.

items.text: `mi klama la zarci la zdani zo'e la karce` → ?
items.answer: `fa mi cu klama fe la zarci fi la zdani fu la karce`

items.text: `do klama la .paris. la .london. la dargu la .treni.` → ?
items.answer: `fa do cu klama fe la .paris. fi la .london. fo la dargu fu la .treni.`

items.text: `mi klama la zdani zo'e zo'e la karce` → ?
items.answer: `fu la karce fa mi cu klama fe la zdani`

items.text: `la .bob. cu klama la .paris. zo'e zo'e la .treni.` → ?
items.answer: `fu la .treni. fa la .bob. cu klama fe la .paris.`

items.text: `fu la karce fa do cu klama fe la zarci`
items.answer: By car, you go to the market.

items.text: `fa mi cu nitcu fe la skami`

items.answer: Alice is able to do this. / Alice can do this.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I go to Paris by car." → mi klama la .paris. zo'e zo'e la karce
  2. Same with vehicle first: → fu la karce fa mi cu klama fe la .paris.
  3. "I need a book." → mi nitcu la cukta
  4. "I can go." → mi kakne la klama (or mi kakne lo nu klama)

Today's Vocab

Lojban Place Structure English
nitcu x1 needs x2 for purpose x3 need
kakne x1 is able to do x2 under conditions x3 able

Complete place tag system:

Tag Marks
fa x1
fe x2
fi x3
fo x4
fu x5

items.place: x1 needs x2 for purpose x3
x1 is able to do x2 under conditions x3

sections.content:
Summary

You learned fu, completing the place tag system. With fa/fe/fi/fo/fu, you can mark any of the five places and arrange sumti in any order.

Tomorrow preview: You'll practice mixing tags with positional placement for efficiency.
sections.tomorrow: You'll practice mixing tags with positional placement for efficiency.
